jeudeloie

Interface Cell

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GooseCell, NormalCell, StartCell, TeleportCell, TrapCell, WaitCell

    public interface Cell
    Cell is the interface representing a cell on the board of the game.
    Author:
    Theo Plockyn & Remy Debue

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBeLeftNow()
      Checks if the cell can be left at this turn
      int getIndex()
      Gets the cell's index
      Player getPlayer()
      Gets the occupying player.
      int handleMove(int diceThrow)
      Returns the index of the cell really reached, adding special effects if needed.
      boolean isBusy()
      Checks if the cell is currently occupied.
      boolean isRetaining()
      Checks if the cell can be left at all.
      void leave()
      Is called when the player leaves the cell, thus setting the occupying player to null.
      void welcome(Player player)
      Sets the cell's new player

    • Method Detail

      • canBeLeftNow

        boolean canBeLeftNow()
        Checks if the cell can be left at this turn
        Returns:
        true if it can be left, false else

      • isRetaining

        boolean isRetaining()
        Checks if the cell can be left at all.
        Returns:
        true if it can't be left at all, false else.

      • getIndex

        int getIndex()
        Gets the cell's index

      • handleMove

        int handleMove(int diceThrow)
        Returns the index of the cell really reached, adding special effects if needed.

      • isBusy

        boolean isBusy()
        Checks if the cell is currently occupied.

      • welcome

        void welcome(Player player)
        Sets the cell's new player

      • leave

        void leave()
        Is called when the player leaves the cell, thus setting the occupying player to null.

      • getPlayer

        Player getPlayer()
        Gets the occupying player.
